CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 5, 1959, pg. 7, reads: "Annual Affair Thoroughly Enjoyed by Youngsters - Courier Newsboys Play, Eat, Win Prizes at Picnic - Readying For The Races"
TitMainTitle: Crowd of women, men, girls, and boys, including one standing on right wearing paisley short sleeve shirt, gathered around picnic tables under pavilion at South Park for Pittsburgh Courier Newsboy Picnic
CatSubject_tab: Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Boys--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Girls--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Picnicking--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Tables--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Allegheny County (Pa.).Department of Parks, Recreation, and Conservation.South Park.
